title: Locus of control, environment, and small-medium business performance in pilgrimage tourism: The mediating role of product innovation
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Amelia Setyawati, Rayyan Sugangga, Raya Sulistyowati, Bagus Shandy Narmaditya, Farij Ibadil Maula, Nyuherno Aris Wibowo, Yuda Prasetya
